member.name: T:MyBooseAppFramework.BooseContext
member.summary: Singleton context holding shared interpreter services.

member.name: P:MyBooseAppFramework.BooseContext.Variables
member.summary: Variable store used by the interpreter.

member.name: P:MyBooseAppFramework.BooseContext.Output
member.summary: Output target.

member.name: T:MyBooseAppFramework.BooseSyntaxException
member.summary: Represents an error in the syntax of a BOOSE program (e.g. unknown command or badly formatted coordinates).

member.name: T:MyBooseAppFramework.BooseRuntimeException
member.summary: Represents a runtime error that occurs while executing a valid BOOSE program.

member.name: T:MyBooseAppFramework.BoosePen
member.summary: Represents the virtual drawing pen used by the BOOSE interpreter. Tracks its current X and Y coordinates.

member.name: P:MyBooseAppFramework.BoosePen.X
member.summary: Current X coordinate of the pen.

member.name: P:MyBooseAppFramework.BoosePen.Y
member.summary: Current Y coordinate of the pen.

member.name: M:MyBooseAppFramework.BoosePen.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new pen at position (0,0).

member.name: M:MyBooseAppFramework.BoosePen.MoveTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the pen to the specified position without drawing.

member.name: M:MyBooseAppFramework.BoosePen.DrawTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws to the specified position (currently just updates X and Y).

member.name: T:MyBooseAppFramework.BooseProgramRunner
member.summary: Executes simple BOOSE programs consisting of variables, if/else, loops and methods. Maintains a single BoosePen instance.

member.name: M:MyBooseAppFramework.BooseProgramRunner.About
member.summary: Returns information about this BOOSE library, used for the About display.

member.name: P:MyBooseAppFramework.BooseProgramRunner.Pen
member.summary: The pen used by this runner to track the current coordinates.

member.name: P:MyBooseAppFramework.BooseProgramRunner.PenColor
member.summary: Current pen colour.

member.name: P:MyBooseAppFramework.BooseProgramRunner.Commands
member.summary: List of drawing commands produced while running the program. Each entry is a simple string that the UI can parse and draw.

member.name: M:MyBooseAppFramework.BooseProgramRunner.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new program runner with a fresh pen at (0,0).

member.name: M:MyBooseAppFramework.BooseProgramRunner.Run(System.String)
member.summary: Runs a BOOSE program made up of commands (one per line). Supports: variables, if/else/endif, while/endwhile, for/endfor, and methods (method/end method/call).

member.name: T:MyBooseAppFramework.Commands.CircleCommand
member.summary: Command to draw a circle at the current pen position.

member.name: T:MyBooseAppFramework.Commands.WriteCommand
member.summary: Command to write text at the current pen position.

member.name: T:MyBooseAppFramework.Stores.VariableStore
member.summary: Stores scalar and array variables.
